advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Steven automatically converts your everyday life into emoji. 

As you go places, Steven will update your emoji status based on your phone’s location. Steven is a smart location app, and Steven gets better at detecting your status the more that you use it. 

Check Steven to see what your friends are up to.

Add Photos and Videos with friends to share more about what you are doing.

Scrub through your friends days with Steven's amazing scrubbing feature.

-----------
Steven can't determine your location without WiFi. Make sure that your WiFi is enabled.  
Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
-----------
releaseNotes:
* You can now post Videos on Steven!
* Better status detection when you are moving!

* Video on Steven:
To record a video - press and hold the capture button to record a short looping video.
Videos can be up to 6 seconds long, and they will loop when you view them.
Videos have sound - but the audio won't play if your phone's silent switch is on.

We worked a bunch on making the app more useful while you are on the move. Now when you open the app on a bus, you'll see emoji's specific to your mode of transit. Try it out and let us know what you think!

Keep the feedback coming. support@steventheapp.com
